response: reasoning='To satisfy all constraints, the glide angle θ must be chosen to exactly meet the horizontal distance requirement of 4000 meters. Calculating θ using arctan(800/4000) gives θ ≈ 11.31°. The vehicle volume V is set to 0.7 m³, ensuring the mass (700 kg) does not exceed the density limit (700/0.7 = 1000 kg/m³ ≤ 1025 kg/m³). Energy consumption is calculated with average power (175 W) over the mission time (≈1.13 hours), resulting in 198.3 Wh, within the 200 Wh limit. This configuration meets all performance constraints.' config=ConfigFile(angle=11.31, volume=0.7, mass=700.0)
